issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

fields.description:
Description:
In KitchenSink, in email dialog, the first attempt to email failed after selecting an image. On both devices, "no email available" was presented. The Galaxy had gmail configured, and the Xoom had both a Gmail and another email account configured. The second attempt was successful.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS with 1.8.0.1
2) Navigate to Base UI>Views>Email Dialog
3) Select an image

Result:
"no email available"  presented

Expected:
Email sent dialog

Note:
Does not occur with 1.7.5
Does not occur on the second attempt
fields.summary: Android: emailDialog - v8/rhino - First attempt at emailing resulted in "no email available" despite proper configuration
